UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile within the BeMatch application.

uid.description: The Firebase Authentication UID associated with this user.

fullName.description: The user's full name, max 14 characters.

genderPreference.description: The gender the user is interested in matching with.

profilePicture.description: URL of the user's main profile picture.

images.description: A list of image objects for the user's profile photos.

interests.description: A list of the user's interests.

bio.description: A short biography or description of the user, limited to 100 characters.

distancePreference.description: Maximum distance in kilometers for potential matches.

ageRange.description: The preferred age range for matches.

expandAgeRange.description: Whether to show people outside the preferred age range if there are no matches.

isOnline.description: Indicates if the user is currently online.

lastSeen.description: The last time the user was seen online.

Match.title: Match
Match.description: Represents an interaction or match between two users.

user1Id.description: The UID of the first user (lexicographically smaller).

user2Id.description: The UID of the second user (lexicographically larger).

status.description: The current status of the interaction.

matchDate.description: The date and time when the match was confirmed.

isSuperLike.description: Indicates if this interaction was initiated with a Super Like.

superLikeInitiator.description: UID of the user who sent the Super Like.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single message within a chat conversation.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatMessage entity.

senderId.description: Reference to UserProfile who sent the message, or 'system'.

text.description: The text content of the message.

imageUrl.description: URL of an image sent in the message.

imagePublicId.description: Public ID of the image on Cloudinary for deletion.

audioDuration.description: Duration of the audio message in seconds.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the message was sent.

isRead.description: Indicates if the message has been read by the recipient.

readTimestamp.description: The date and time when the message was read.

action.description: Action taken on a system message.

actionTaken.description: Indicates if an action has been taken on the system message.

isEdited.description: Indicates if the message has been edited.

editedAt.description: The date and time when the message was last edited.

definition.description: Stores interaction data (likes, dislikes, matches) between two users. The document ID is a composite key of the two user UIDs, sorted lexicographically.
Stores denormalized data for confirmed matches for a specific user, allowing for easy querying of a user's match list.
Stores chat messages for a specific confirmed match. Access is controlled by match membership.
